name: Dragon's Blood Fishing Game
description:
Attributions:

-The sound effect for catching a fish and/or doll is a remix that's based off of the collectable sound effect from the Legend of Zelda: Zelda: BOTW - "High Value" Item Get | Sound Effect 

-The sound effect for catching a bottle is remix based off of the iconic item sound effect from the Legend of Zelda: Item Get - The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess

I used sheet music as reference for creating these two sound effects. 

-Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/town-theme-rpg  

-Splash Sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/water-splashes  

-Font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/playfair-display.font

-Fishing Bob Sprites were provided by Nathan Hahn: https://heyacfox.itch.io/

I provided the art for the background, Prince Sprites, and the icon.
